content: who doesn t love a pretty earwarmer right it s even better if you can get the pattern for **free** this beautiful earwarmer works up super fast and with the rich texture it looks so cute you can get the pattern for free on my blog if you click on the link above **difficulty ** advanced beginner **size ** one size only to fit an average adult s head but it can be easily adjusted **gauge ** not important **us terms** used throughout i hope you will love this pattern as much as i did when created it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina*
